home.title: Timedoor Coding Academy
home.subtitle: Fun Way to Code The Future

about.title: About Us
content: Timedoor Coding Academy's mission is to empower Indonesian society to become technology innovators who have a positive influence on the future. Our curriculum combines coding skills with character education and digital literacy, preparing students to create technology and foster positive change in society.
We believe that our students will not only excel in creating innovative technology but also contribute to building a better, more sustainable society.
Join Timedoor Coding Academy and be part of the next generation of tech leaders and social innovators.

address.title: Address
address.content: Jalan Tukad Yeh Aya IX No. 46, Renon, Denpasar

online.title: Online Classes
online.description: Learn from anywhere with our interactive online classes. Flexible schedules and expert instructors at your fingertips.

offline.title: Offline Classes
offline.description: Join us in-person for hands-on learning experiences. Collaborate with peers and receive personalized guidance from our instructors.

hybrid.title: Hybrid Classes
hybrid.description: Enjoy the flexibility of both online and offline learning. Get the best of both worlds with our innovative hybrid approach.

contact.title: Contact Us
